meanings.definition: A medication used to prevent and treat osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed raloxifene to help strengthen my bones.
meanings.sent2: She takes raloxifene every day to keep her bones healthy.
meanings.sent3: The raloxifene bottle on the shelf winked at me, reminding me to take care of my bones.
meanings.sent4: Her bones were like a fortress protected by the shield of raloxifene.
meanings.sent5: The image of raloxifene pill popping into her mouth became a symbol of bone health in her mind.

meanings.definition: Raloxifene is also used to reduce the risk of invasive breast cancer in postmenopausal women with osteoporosis.
meanings.sent1: After her diagnosis, she started taking raloxifene to lower her chances of breast cancer.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended raloxifene to decrease the risk of breast cancer in postmenopausal women.
meanings.sent3: The raloxifene tablets in her handbag whispered words of protection against breast cancer.
meanings.sent4: Her body became a fortress guarded by the shield of raloxifene against breast cancer invaders.
meanings.sent5: The thought of raloxifene acted as a beacon of hope in her battle against breast cancer.
